price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߛߐ߫ ߟߍߙߊ ߣߌ߫ ߝߊߙߊ߲ߝߊߛߌߟߊ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߖߐ߲߬ߛߴߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߞߊ߲ߘߊ߫
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wal-fur'qāna laʿallakum tahtadūna
